content:
Yes, there have been efforts in recent years to improve the education and skill level of Jhansi's workforce. The government of Uttar Pradesh, the state where Jhansi is located, has launched various programs to increase access to education and training for its citizens. 

In Jhansi specifically, there are a number of technical and vocational training institutes that offer courses in areas such as engineering, IT, and hospitality. These courses aim to provide students with the skills needed to secure employment in high-growth industries. Additionally, the Jhansi district administration has established an industrial training institute that offers job-oriented training to youth to improve their employability. 

Moreover, the government has also been promoting entrepreneurship and self-employment in Jhansi through various schemes and initiatives. This includes providing mentoring support, financial assistance, and market linkages to aspiring entrepreneurs. By creating a more skilled workforce and promoting self-employment, Jhansi can significantly boost its economic growth and development.
